snippet.title: Endgame: Syria Trailer
snippet.description: Endgame Syria is an interactive exploration of events unfolding in Syria today. It is a news-game; a simulation that uses interactivity to explore a real world event. Developed in around two weeks, the game allows users to explore the options open to the Syrian rebels as they push the conflict to its endgame.
